Title: Relates to preventing the use of funds, financial incentives, subsidies or tax exemptions for projects with non-public occupants
Summary: Prevents the use of funds, financial incentives, subsidies or tax exemptions for projects where the occupier of the project is not disclosed.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to preventing the use of funds, financial incentives, subsidies or tax exemptions for project occupants which are not public
